channel.title: [508] Cthulhuscape [508] Looking for members!
channel.description:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Introduction
Hello Everybody,
I have been a coder for quite some time and i am ready to take my skills to the next level... i want to put my server online... but there is just ONE problem with that. I don't have a VPS. I have a good server right now, but it is not complete yet. Right now i am adding in commands and other things. I have some major goals to accomplish while i am coding and running this server online. Here are some of the things that this server has:
• Excellent combat system • Fully Working Grand Exchange • All Skills • Full Trading • IP changing client
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Goals
I have been working on this base for a few months now cause i have to add, take out, and edit alot of things. It is about 3/4 complete.
• Run the server and receive donations • Upgrade from the forums site i have now to Joomla
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Positions Available
Hoster: 0/1 Coder: 1/4 Beta Tester: 1/4 Forum Creator: 1/1
And when you become a staff member you will become either a mod or admin on the server depending on how much you help out. __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
If you are interested in joining in the development please fill out an application form.
Application Form
Your Name: Experience: What job you are applying for: Why you would like to be part of the team: Your msn/contact information:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Accepted Applications
Pending Applications
Denied Applications __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Thanks to everyone if you have read and I hope to see some good applicants.
- Cthulhuscape Creator

item.title: [508] Cthulhuscape [508] Looking for members!
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Your Name: QuestMaster 2K10
Experience: I have alot of Programming Experience through HTML, Java, -some- Java Script, Batch File, -some- C++, and some others I can’t remember.
What job you are applying for: Coder, I can code Some very excellent features that aren’t even on any server higher of 503+, and I’m very good with Quest Making.
Why you would like to be part of the team: I don’t know, it’s easier to Have a big and successful server with a team, rather than by yourself.
Your msn/contact information: ServerSoft2010@live.com - PM me if your interested, so i’ll know when to be on by.

PM Me if Interested.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Cthulhuscape [508] Looking for members!
item.dc:creator: @toxix toxix
item.description:
@toxix wrote:

Your Name: Lexi/Alexis

Experience: Well i’ve taken a few classes on programming… one being an advanced java class… I have run my own servers in the past, but it’s been quite awhile. I also am fairly decent with gfx although it’s been awhile since i’ve used photoshop either.

What job you are applying for: Wherever i’m needed i guess [i’d like to talk about it first].

Why you would like to be part of the team: Well with the free time i have, i’d like to help out and try to enjoy myself.

Your msn/contact information: x_lexi_o@live.com

Read full topic
